Package com.visionspace.taskmanager

Interface TaskDescriptor

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExplicitTaskDescriptor, ReflectionTaskDescriptor
public interface TaskDescriptor
Task descriptor interface. This contains all the task information that is needed for it to be executed in a remote node.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    RunnableTask createRunnableTask()
    Instantiates a RunnableTask that is responsible for the task behavior.
    java.lang.Object[] getArgs()
    The arguments that are passed to the task when it is validated and executed.
    long getMaxWaitTimeMillis()
    Gets the maximum time a task can be delayed in case all worker threads are busy at the time it is intended to start.

  • Method Details

    • getMaxWaitTimeMillis

      long getMaxWaitTimeMillis()
      Gets the maximum time a task can be delayed in case all worker threads are busy at the time it is intended to start. If the task has to wait for more than this period, it will be set to TaskState.FAILED and will not be executed.
      Returns:
      The maximum wait time in milliseconds, 0 if there is no limit.

    • getArgs

      java.lang.Object[] getArgs()
      The arguments that are passed to the task when it is validated and executed.
      Returns:
      The task arguments.

    • createRunnableTask

      RunnableTask createRunnableTask()
      Instantiates a RunnableTask that is responsible for the task behavior.
      Returns:
      The RunnableTask.
